title: ArtyTorrent Pack 88-BFA-Hardcore Breakbeat Action 1-WAV
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 88-BFA-Hardcore Breakbeat Action 1-WAV
-------------------------------------------------------

Hardcore Breakbeat Action is an awesome 4-disc pack from Big Fish Audio. <a href="
http://www.bigfishaudio.com/4dcgi/detail.html?300" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.bigfishaudio.com/4dcgi/detail.html?300</a>

Loops and oneshots are arranged in the construction kit format allowing easy arrangement of songs.
Around 250MB of each of the 2 CD-ROMs is taken up with demonstrations of (admittedly fantastic) songs made using the construction kits, but since these long demos are of no use to a music producer seeking to expand his library of usable samples, I&#039;ve not included them in this pack.
This torrent is based on WAV CD 1. I&#039;ve left the directory structure more or less untouched, apart from moving the oneshots into categorized folders after trimming them appropriately.

Torrent contains 3 RAR files with 515 samples
---------------------------------------------
HBA1 Bonus Drumloops (26)
HBA1 Cons Kit Loops (283 loops in 32 kits)
HBA1 Oneshots (206 drum and perc hits, basses and synths)

Files have beeen renamed to prevent confusion (how many samples called bass1.wav have you got already?) and many have also been converted to mono where right and left channels were identical.
Each construction kit folder includes tempo and root key information, and all files are acidized.
Samples are normalized 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz.

Disc 2 will follow once I&#039;ve restructured it in similar fashion.

--
Arty - "I need a break"
26th February 2008.
